predicates.name: author_of
predicates.description: True when a person is the author of a specific work (e.g., book, movie, song).

predicates.name: located_at
predicates.description: True when an entity is located at or has a connection to a specific location.

predicates.name: type_of
predicates.description: True when an entity belongs to or can be classified as a specific type (e.g., genre, category).

predicates.name: part_of
predicates.description: True when one entity is part of another entity (e.g., a component of a larger system).

predicates.name: created_by
predicates.description: True when a work was created by or under the direction of a specific person.

predicates.name: published_on
predicates.description: True when a work was published on a specific date (e.g., release date, publication date).
